document.full_text: human rights experts see the case, related to a woman's abduction in the 1970s, as a watershed for ending impunity for crimes against humanity committed under uruguay's military dictatorship.
document.title: court condemns uruguay for a disappearance
lines_and_colors: human rights experts see the case, related to a woman's abduction in the 1970s, as a watershed for ending impunity for crimes against humanity committed under uruguay's military dictatorship.
